title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: October 26, 2022, 07:01:37 PMLast edit: November 15, 2022, 04:18:08 AM by MoparMiningLLC
content: Balletcrypto has produced a Limited Edition wallet commemorating El Salvador's adoption of Bitcoin.They have produced only 210 of these Limited Edition wallets - They are the plastic (not metal) version and are BTC Only and denominated as .001 BTC and are sold unloaded. Balletcrypto is providing me with 25 of these wallets and they have requested that I auction them off in bundles of 5, so there will be 5 lots in this auction.Card Face:How card appears in Ballet App (serial number and address removed)STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0000BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: OCTOBER 31th, 2022, 11:00 PM Eastern Time**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. SHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceHighest Bids:Lot 1: hookzup1 .004 BTC winnerLot 2: pinky1234 .004 BTC winnerLot 3: DirtyBirdE .004 BTC winnerLot 4: Amax16 .004 BTC winnerLot 5: 123Dave .005 BTC winner
